welcome_message:
🎉 *Welcome to FinZo AI – Your Personal Savings Hero!* 🎉

Looking to save money on your home loan? You're in the right place! Our smart bot makes refinancing simple, clear, and stress-free. We'll show you how much you could save with a better deal. 💸

*Stuck at any point?* No worries! Just type **"restart"** and we'll start fresh.

Ready to see how much you can save? 🚀
get_name: 📝 *To kick things off, we'll need your NAME* — so we know who to address when sharing your savings story!
get_age:
🎉 *Next up, we'll need your AGE* 

(between **18 and 70**).
get_loan_amount:
💰 *We need to know your ORIGINAL LOAN AMOUNT* — this is the total amount you borrowed when you first took out your home loan.

Here's how you can enter it:
 * *100k* = RM100,000
 * *1.2m* = RM1,200,000
get_loan_tenure: 📅 *Next, we will need to know your ORIGINAL LOAN TENURE* — this is the total number of years you agreed to repay your home loan.
get_monthly_repayment: 💸 *We need to know your CURRENT MONTHLY INSTALLMENT* — this is the amount you're currently paying to the bank every month for your home loan.
get_interest_rate: 📈 Do you remember your current loan's *INTEREST RATE*? If you're not sure, just type **SKIP**
get_remaining_tenure:
⏳ *How many years are LEFT ON YOUR LOAN?* 

If you have 10 years left, type *10*. If you're not sure, just type *SKIP*.
process_completion:
🎉 *Great job — you're all set!*

We're crunching the numbers to create your personalized *Refinance Savings Summary* 🧮💸.
savings_breakdown: By refinancing, you could save up to *RM {monthly_savings:,.2f} every month*, which adds up to *RM {yearly_savings:,.2f} every year* and a total of *RM {lifetime_savings:,.2f} over the entire loan term*!
whats_next: 🔍 *What's next?* A specialist will be assigned to generate a *FULL DETAILED REPORT* for you — *free of charge and with no obligations!*
loan_tenure_error: ❌ Loan tenure must be between 1 and 40 years.
interest_rate_error: ❌ Interest rate must be between 3% and 10%.
